name: Propiedades Punto Com S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Operator of a property listings platform designed to empower real estate consumers to find the ideal place to live, to undertake and to enjoy. The company's platform focuses on transparency, efficiency and boost the real estate market and urban development in the country through technology and also present graphs with prices and other data to make comparison easier, enabling citizens to find an intelligent way, a community and a home to develop their lives.
